question: At which of the following places, Volcanoes are generally found?
option1: Intraplates crush against each other or pull apart
option2: Earth's crust crush against each other or pull apart
option3: Tectonic plates crush against each other or pull apart
answer: Tectonic plates crush against each other or pull apart
explanation: Most of the volcanoes are present at the places where the tectonic plates crush against each other or pull apart. Sixty percent of all active volcanoes occur at the boundaries between tectonic plates.
